This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] [sandboxed-iframe-allow-storage-access-by-user-activation] document.requestStorageAccess() should resolve even without a user gesture when already granted.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotAllowedError: requestStorageAccess not allowed"
[FAIL] [sandboxed-iframe-allow-storage-access-by-user-activation] document.requestStorageAccess() should resolve with a user gesture
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "NotAllowedError: requestStorageAccess not allowed"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
